text: Flying Over Grass () is a 1969 Hong Kong action drama movie directed by Lung Chien and starring Ching-Ching Chang, Pin Chiang and Hsia Chiang. == Plot == In China of Middle Age, a swordswoman called "Flight over Grass", helps a group of people defeat a terrible warlord. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1969 action movies Category:1969 drama movies Category:Hong Kong action movies Category:Hong Kong drama movies Category:Movies directed by Lung Chien
title: Flyning Over Grass
